# Machine learning applications using OMOP-CDM

This is the website for the practical session titled **Machine learning
applications using OMOP-CDM**, prepared by Alexandros Rekkas.

The practical will use modified data from
[Synthea&trade;](https://synthetichealth.github.io/synthea/). It can be
downloaded from
[here](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1l5wq57fAslnoFR2umFQvVZbDiq5IK0UF/view).
The download contains a zipped `duckdb` database.
